rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
Whenever Ryujin of Otherworldly Light attacks, [b][create two 2/1 white Spirit Samurai creature tokens][/b], then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
Flash paradigm {3}{W} [i](You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its paradigm cost.)[/i]
